author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1597 Migration doc updates to mention the new Compatibility flag.

author: mmartinec
msg: Bug 5264: Specification of DNS-query source port range;
Bug 6221: DnsResolver.pm attempts to bind ports at random;
admin control over the set of local port numbers used
in sending DNS queries to a resolving DNS server, or
letting the operating system choose a free port number.
Also avoids a sequential ports scanning when one is
unlucky that a random start point falls in a range
The 10_default_prefs.cf now brings a set of
assigned high port numbers and some other ranges.

author: bentmann
msg: [MNG-4326] Maven should not check snapshot repositories for dependencies in the reactor

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-2589: xslt component now supports output option. Added file based xslt output to stream directly to file to avoid using in memory type.
